titleStmt.title: The compleat memoirs of the life of that notorious impostor Will. Morrell, alias Bowyer, alias Wickham, &c. Who died at Mr. Cullen's the bakers in the strand, Jan. 3. 1691/2. With considerable additions never before published. Licensed, April 14. 1694.
titleStmt.author: Settle, Elkanah, 1648-1724.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Abel Roper and E. Wilkinson at the Black Boy over against St. Dunstan's Church in Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The history of the life of William Morrell alias Bowyer.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
